title: "Things happen" - Mauricio Pochettino opens up on 'different reasons' for Chelsea exit
snippet: The 53-year-old, who is now the manager of the United States Men's National Team (USMNT), spent just one year at Stamford Bridge under the Todd Boehly-Clearlake Capital ownership before he was eventually replaced by current head coach Enzo Maresca.
